issues.description: The problem statement contains conflicting specifications for the type of the `animals` attribute in `Farm`: the UML diagram declares it as `List<Animal>`, whereas the textual instructions in Part 3 require using a `Set<Animal>` (backed by a `HashSet`). Additionally, the reference solution implements `Farm.animals` as a `List<Animal>`, which contradicts the textual requirement to use a `Set<Animal>` (HashSet) to enforce uniqueness.
issues.suggested_fix: Unify the specification by choosing either a `List<Animal>` (and update the text to remove references to `Set`) or changing the UML to `Set<Animal>` and updating the solution to use `Set<Animal> animals = new HashSet<>()` so that all artifacts agree.
